snippet.title: Creepy Brawlers Trailer - Mega Cat Studios - NEW Nintendo game NES
snippet.description:
After a spectral hand pulls you out of your seat and into the silver screen, you become the underdog in an underworld championship. Lace-up your gloves and get ready to duck, bob, and
weave as you punch-out a marathon of movie monsters, including the wolfman, backwoods
psycho, and a very slick vampire. Dodge special attacks and time your counters perfectly, because a KO means losing the round...and your soul.

- A marathon of movie monsters to battle through
-Every villain has their own special power moves!
-Stun enemies with perfectly timed counters!
-Block, dodge, and jab your way to a championship belt!

Get your copy at: https://megacatstudios.com/collections/nes-games/products/creepy-brawlers-for-the-nintendo-entertainment-system

Come join in on the discussion at our official Discord: https://discordapp.com/invite/megacat

Creepy Brawlers is not licensed, sponsored, published, or endorsed by Nintendo Co. Ltd, or their affiliates.

Mega Cat Studios is an independent games development studio. This title is an unofficial and unlicensed release for the Nintendo console, and is not affiliated with Nintendo Co., Ltd, or their affiliates. 

Nintendo® and Famicom® are trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd.
For more on Mega Cat Studios and our games, please visit: https://megacatstudios.com/

Come play & talk on discord! www.discord.gg/megacat
